name: TzumiSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn on sweeping robot”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tzumi smart
des:
Control your Tzumi Smart Appliances and Lights with simple voice commands, harvesting the power of speech with the Alexa skill you can talk naturally and your smart lights will turn on/off, change color or dim to create the most magical atmosphere, tell your vacuum to start cleaning, sit back and relax while your home gets clean.

There are infinite applications and scenarios where you can use your voice to control your smart appliances and lights, to enjoy the power of Alexa, follow these simple steps to set it up and get it running:
- Open the Amazon Alexa app on your smart device and select ‘Skills’ from the options menu
- Once you are on the ‘Skills’ page, search for ‘Tzumi Smart’ and tap ‘Enable’
- Use your Tzumi Smart Home APP credentials to log in to give Alexa access to control the Tzumi Smart Appliances and Lights
- You are now ready to control the Tzumi Smart Appliances and Lights with simple voice commands.

- Try these:
 “Alexa, turn on the Smart vac” – the Smart Clean Robo Vac will start a cleaning cycle
 “Alexa, turn off the Smart vac” – the Smart Clean Robo Vac will stop a cleaning cycle
 “Alexa, turn the Smart Strip on” – the smart strip will turn ON
 “Alexa, turn the Smart Strip off” – the smart strip will turn OFF
 “Alexa, set the Smart Strip to 50%” – the smart strip will dim to 50%
 “Alexa, change the Smart Strip color to purple” – the smart strip will turn purple

Go ahead, try some other commands and see magic happening!!

If there are any issues or you need any further assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our amazing and knowledgeable customer service team at: support@tzumi.com
